Description.enUS:
Contains upgrades for Terran infantry units.

Enables:
- Firebat at the Barracks
- Medic at the Barracks
Description.zhCN:
Contains upgrades for Terran infantry units.

Enables:
- Firebat at the Barracks
- Medic at the Barracks
Description.koKR:
Contains upgrades for Terran infantry units.

Enables:
- Firebat at the Barracks
- Medic at the Barracks

Tooltip.enUS: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить сооружение этого строения, уничтожив его и получив частичную компенсацию.

Tooltip.enUS: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приостановить сооружение этого строения. Впоследствии его можно будет продолжить.

Tooltip.enUS: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Tooltip.ruRU: Выбрать рабочего, который сооружает это строение.

Tooltip.enUS: Improves the Marine's Gauss Rifle increasing its range by .
Tooltip.zhCN: Improves the Marine's Gauss Rifle increasing its range by .
Tooltip.koKR: Improves the Marine's Gauss Rifle increasing its range by .

Tooltip.enUS: Enables Marines and Firebats to use the Stimpack ability. Stimpacks cause damage to a unit, but they increase its attack and movement speeds for a short time.
Tooltip.zhCN: Enables Marines and Firebats to use the Stimpack ability. Stimpacks cause damage to a unit, but they increase its attack and movement speeds for a short time.
Tooltip.koKR: Enables Marines and Firebats to use the Stimpack ability. Stimpacks cause damage to a unit, but they increase its attack and movement speeds for a short time.

Tooltip.enUS: Enables the Medic to use the Restoration ability. Restoration removes any negative effects on target units.
Tooltip.zhCN: Enables the Medic to use the Restoration ability. Restoration removes any negative effects on target units.
Tooltip.koKR: Enables the Medic to use the Restoration ability. Restoration removes any negative effects on target units.

Tooltip.enUS: Enables the Medic to use the Optic Flare ability. Optic Flare blinds the target reducing its vision range and disabling Detection.
Tooltip.zhCN: Enables the Medic to use the Optic Flare ability. Optic Flare blinds the target reducing its vision range and disabling Detection.
Tooltip.koKR: Enables the Medic to use the Optic Flare ability. Optic Flare blinds the target reducing its vision range and disabling Detection.

Tooltip.enUS: Increases the Medic's energy by and starting energy by .
Tooltip.zhCN: Increases the Medic's energy by and starting energy by .
Tooltip.koKR: Increases the Medic's energy by and starting energy by .

Tooltip.enUS: Allows training of Firebats at the Barracks.
Tooltip.zhCN: Allows training of Firebats at the Barracks.
Tooltip.koKR: Allows training of Firebats at the Barracks.

Tooltip.enUS: Allows training of Medics at the Barracks.
Tooltip.zhCN: Allows training of Medics at the Barracks.
Tooltip.koKR: Allows training of Medics at the Barracks.

Tooltip.enUS: Allows training of Ghosts at the Barracks.
Tooltip.zhCN: Allows training of Ghosts at the Barracks.
Tooltip.koKR: Allows training of Ghosts at the Barracks.

Tooltip.enUS: Increases the Medic's energy by and starting energy by .
